thread.title: The Incredible Shrinking Exxon

author: Spencer Jakab
title: The Incredible Shrinking Exxon
text:
Exxon Mobil put an exclamation point on what ails big oil on Friday.
Never mind the immediate reaction to its slightly tepid first-quarter results. Despite just announcing its 36th annual dividend increase in a row, the total shareholder return of the worldâ€™s largest private oil company is flat over the past year even as crude prices have rallied by over 50%.
